Description: An identifier for this tender process. This may be the same as the ocid, or may be drawn from an internally held identifier for this tender.
Tender title
Tender description
The current status of the tender based on the tenderStatus codelist
The goods and services to be purchased, broken into line items wherever possible. Items should not be duplicated, but a quantity of 2 specified instead. See Item section for further details.
The minimum estimated value of the procurement. See Value
The total upper estimated value of the procurement. See Value
Specify tendering method against the method codelist as per GPA definitions of Open, Selective, Limited
Rationale of procurement method, especially in the case of Limited tendering.
Specify the award criteria for the procurement, using the award criteria codelist
Any detailed or further information on the award or selection criteria.
Specify the method by which bids must be submitted, in person, written, or electronic auction. Using the submission method codelist

Any detailed or further information on the submission method. This may include the address, e-mail address or online service to which bids should be submitted, and any special requirements to be followed for submissions.
The period when the tender is open for submissions. The end date is the closing date for tender submissions. See Period
The period during which enquiries may be made and answered. See Period
A Yes/No field to indicate whether enquiries were part of tender process.
A description of any eligibility criteria for potential suppliers.
The date or period on which an award is anticipated to be made. See Period
All entities who submit a tender. See Organization section for further details.
The entity managing the procurement, which may be different from the buyer who is paying / using the items being procured. See Organization
All documents and attachments related to the tender, including any notices. See the documentType codelist for details of potential documents to include. See Document section for further details.
A list of milestones associated with the tender. See Milestone section for further details.
See Amendment
